statements: DELETE FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE organization = 'ABC Corp' AND issue_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SustainabilityDocuments WHERE organization = 'ABC Inc.' AND issue_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect';
DELETE FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' AND document_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM certifications WHERE certification_authority = 'AWS' AND certification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM supply_chain_records WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA');
